name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WP Ranking - Free WordPress Plugin Rank Checker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension checks the rank of specified WordPress plugins. Now includes Download CSV functionality to export data easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WordPress Plugin Rank Checker is an essential tool for all WordPress Plugin developer and marketers.

Main Features:
This extension checks the rank of specified WordPress plugins.

Instant Rank Checking: The extension allows you to instantly check the rank of any specified WordPress plugins. Simply enter the URL and Keywords of the plugin you're interested in, and the extension will display its rank in real-time. This tool eliminates the need to manually search through the WordPress plugin directory, saving you valuable time and effort.

Download CSV: This functionality allows users to download data in CSV format, making it easy to export and analyze the data.

Easy Access: With the WordPress Plugin Rank Checker, you no longer need to navigate away from your browser or interrupt your workflow to check plugin rankings. The extension integrates directly into your Chrome browser, providing you with immediate access to plugin ranking information whenever you need it.

Data Accuracy: The extension accesses real-time data directly from WordPress, ensuring the accuracy of the ranking information you receive. This allows you to make informed decisions about which plugins to use on your website.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension's design is simple and intuitive, making it easy for users of all skill levels to check plugin rankings. The default popup provides a clear and concise display of the plugin's ranking information.

Privacy Focused: WordPress Plugin Rank Checker requires minimal permissions to function, ensuring your privacy is respected. The extension only needs access to all URLs for data collection purposes, and local storage access to save your preferences and settings.

Use Cases:

For Webmasters and SEO professionals: Use WordPress Plugin Rank Checker to perform competitor analysis and discover the most popular and highly ranked plugins. This will help you to optimize your own site and improve its performance.

WordPress Plugin Rank Checker is your go-to tool for improving your website's performance and staying ahead of the competition. Try it today and experience the difference it can make in your WordPress journey!
